meanings.definition: Retired or honorably discharged from active service but retaining one's rank or title.
meanings.sent1: The emeritus professor gave a lecture on history.
meanings.sent2: The emeritus doctor still volunteers at the hospital.
meanings.sent3: The emeritus librarian joked about organizing books in retirement.
meanings.sent4: The emeritus general's wisdom was a beacon for the young soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The emeritus scientist's discoveries continue to inspire new research.

meanings.definition: Holding the title of one's office after retirement.
meanings.sent1: The emeritus bishop attended the ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The emeritus CEO offered guidance to the new leadership.
meanings.sent3: The emeritus mayor playfully suggested new city policies.
meanings.sent4: The emeritus judge's influence extended beyond the courtroom.
meanings.sent5: The emeritus artist's legacy enriched the local art scene.
